info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

delete.description: Deletes the specified gateway load balancer alias.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: gatewayLoadBalancerAliasName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway load balancer alias.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

Location.description: The URL of the resource used to check the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the specified public IP address in a specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: gatewayLoadBalancerAliasName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway load balancer alias.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting GatewyaLoadBalancerAlias resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a gateway load balancer alias resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: gatewayLoadBalancerAliasName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway load balancer alias.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update gateway load balancer alias.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting gateway load balancer alias resource.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting gateway load balancer alias resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all the gateway load balancer aliases in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of gateway load balancer alias resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all gateway load balancer aliases in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of gateway load balancer alias resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

gatewayLoadBalancer.description: Gateway load balancer frontend ip configuration.

chainedLoadBalancers.description: The list of consumer load balancer frontend ip configurations chained to gateway load balancer alias.

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the gateway load balancer alias resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the gateway load balancer alias resource,.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

value.description: A list of gateway load balancer aliases that exists in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

GatewayLoadBalancerAliasListResult.description: Response for ListGatewayLoadBalancerAliases API service call.
